article.description: Prairie View rolls over Arkansas-Pine Bluff 71-62
article.headline: Prairie View rolls over Arkansas-Pine Bluff 71-62
article.linkText: Prairie View rolls over Arkansas-Pine Bluff 71-62
article.story: PRAIRIE VIEW, Texas -- Montrael Scott scored 28 points and grabbed seven rebounds to lead Prairie View A&M to a 71-62 victory over Arkansas-Pine Bluff Saturday night. Louis Munks had 15 points for the Panthers (6-12, 4-2 Southwestern Athletic Conference). Jules Montgomery and Demondre Chapman each added 12. Tied at 15 at 13:18 in the first period, Prairie View went on a 25-14 run to lead 40-29 at the break. The Panthers maintained a double-digit lead through most of the second period with the Golden Lions coming as close as five with just over a minute to play. A pair of 3-pointers in the final minute -- one by Munks and one by Montgomery -- put the game away. Prairie View was 48 percent from the field overall and 66.7 percent from the line. Marcel Mosley led the Golden Lions (4-14, 2-4) with 19 points. This was the fourth-straight loss for Arkansas-Pine Bluff.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
